Issue.creator: delventhalz
Issue.summary: Replace the existing JS Server with a Rust implementation
Issue.description: The existing implementation of the Track and Trace server|https://github.com/hyperledger/grid-contrib/tree/master/track_and_trace/server (aka REST API) has been implemented in JavaScript/Node.js. In order to bring this component in-line with the rest of the Grid repo, it should be refactored into Rust and added to the Grid daemon (which currently uses Actix).
